name: Splunk Enterprise Security Index Cluster
description: Primary security information and event management data store ingesting approximately three terabytes of log and event data per day across security events, compliance audit trails, DevOps metrics, business intelligence feeds, application logs, and IT operations telemetry distributed across a clustered Indexer architecture with Search Heads, Cluster Masters, and HTTP Event Collector endpoints

encryption_at_rest.key_management: Software Key Store (Splunk KMS — per Splunk Enterprise Security encryption at rest documentation)

breach_notification_obligation.jurisdiction: GDPR (EU/EEA); CCPA (California); UK DPA 2018; multi-jurisdictional per Rackspace global customer base

name: Splunk PCI Compliance Data Store
description: Dedicated Splunk App for PCI Compliance indexes containing cardholder data environment audit evidence, PCI DSS control validation records, and compliance dashboard data covering more than ten areas of PCI security standards with Kinney Group deployment support

encryption_at_rest.key_management: Software Key Store (Splunk KMS); Kinney Group deployment with dedicated index encryption

breach_notification_obligation.jurisdiction: PCI DSS v4.0 Req. 12.10 (incident response); GDPR Art. 33 (72hr authority notification); US state breach notification laws

name: Cloud Feeds CADF Event Store
description: Near real-time usage and system event data store accepting and validating event notifications from Rackspace Cloud services using the Cloud Auditing Data Federation standard and Atom Publishing Protocol across product feeds including Cloud Servers, Cloud Files, Cloud Databases, Cloud Block Storage, Cloud Backup, Cloud Big Data, and Identity user access events

encryption_at_rest.key_management: Software Key Store (Rackspace Cloud Feeds platform-managed encryption)

breach_notification_obligation.jurisdiction: GDPR Art. 33 (initiator identity = personal data per CADF standard); UK DPA 2018; CCPA

name: Cloud Feeds Archive Container
description: Long-term archival store for Cloud Feeds events persisted to Cloud Files containers organized by region with configurable retention beyond the three-day live database window supporting XML and JSON export formats with per-region container configuration via the Archiving Configuration API

encryption_at_rest.key_management: Cloud Files Server-Side Encryption (Rackspace-managed keys via Cloud Files storage backend)

breach_notification_obligation.jurisdiction: GDPR Art. 33; UK DPA 2018; CCPA — same personal data basis as da-003 (CADF initiator identity in archived events)

name: Rackspace Monitoring Time-Series Database
description: Time-series metrics database storing system health data, alert conditions, historical performance data, and capacity planning metrics collected from Cloud Monitoring agent checks across servers in any data center with query API access for historical analysis and threshold alerting

encryption_at_rest.key_management: Software Key Store (Rackspace Monitoring platform-managed encryption)

name: Rackspace Fabric Ticketing Database
description: Ticketing application data store within the Rackspace Fabric proprietary platform supporting request categorization by device type and common request types across the multi-tenant customer base accessible via the MyRackspace Portal and Ticketing API v2.0

encryption_at_rest.key_management: AWS KMS (Rackspace Fabric databases encrypted via AWS Key Management Service per Logbook domain documentation)

breach_notification_obligation.jurisdiction: GDPR Art. 33-34 (customer PII in ticket records); UK DPA 2018; CCPA § 1798.82; multi-jurisdictional per global customer base

name: Rackspace Fabric Billing Data Store
description: Unified billing data store within the Rackspace Fabric platform aggregating usage metering, invoicing, and payment records across AWS, Azure, GCP, and VMware managed cloud environments supporting the billing portal at manage.rackspace.com

encryption_at_rest.key_management: AWS KMS (Rackspace Fabric billing databases encrypted via AWS Key Management Service)

breach_notification_obligation.jurisdiction: GDPR Art. 33-34 (customer financial and billing PII); PCI DSS v4.0 Req. 12.10; CCPA § 1798.82; UK DPA 2018; multi-jurisdictional per AWS/Azure/GCP/VMware global customer base

name: Rackspace Fabric Automation State Store
description: Orchestration and automation state repository within the Rackspace Fabric platform tracking over one billion automated actions per month including self-healing infrastructure events, service delivery workflows, and configuration automation state across managed customer environments

encryption_at_rest.key_management: Software Key Store (Rackspace Fabric platform-managed encryption for key-value store)

name: Moogsoft AIOps Event Correlation Store
description: AI-driven incident resolution data store integrated into Rackspace Fabric applying machine learning to log, metric, trace, and alert data ingested from managed infrastructure to perform event correlation and noise reduction for proactive incident management

name: AWS Systems Manager VM Inventory
description: Configuration state and compliance tracking data store for more than sixty-two thousand virtual machines managed through AWS Systems Manager including patch status records, software inventory, and compliance assessment data supporting mass patching at scale across all managed services

name: Cloud Files Object Store
description: OpenStack Swift-based object storage service providing unlimited storage of files up to five gigabytes each via RESTful API with Cloud Files CDN integration for content delivery and static website hosting across DFW, ORD, IAD, LON, SYD, and HKG regions

name: Rackspace Object Storage (Dell ECS)
description: S3-compatible unstructured data storage service built on Dell ECS storage systems with FIPS 140-2 Level 1 compliant AES-256 encryption at rest and TLS 1.2 transport encryption providing petabyte-scale capacity across globally distributed data centers with multi-tier performance options and cross-datacenter replication

name: Cloud Databases Instance Store
description: Database-as-a-service data store supporting MySQL, MariaDB, Percona, and PostgreSQL instances provisioned through the Cloud Databases API with configurable memory and storage allocation, automated backups, and usage event reporting through Cloud Feeds

name: Cloud Block Storage Volume Store
description: Block-level storage volumes attached to Cloud Server instances available in SSD and SATA tiers with snapshot capability for point-in-time recovery and usage events published to Cloud Feeds for metering and audit

name: Cloud Backup Vault
description: Agent-based backup data store supporting file-level backup and restore for Cloud Servers with configurable scheduling, retention policies, bandwidth tracking via Cloud Feeds events, and encrypted backup containers stored in Cloud Files

name: Cloud Queues Message Store
description: OpenStack Marconi-based message queuing data store supporting producer-consumer and publish-subscribe messaging patterns with message TTL between sixty seconds and fourteen days, claim-based processing, and JSON document payloads up to ten messages per batch

name: Mailgun Event Log Store
description: Transactional email event log repository built on ElasticSearch tracking every inbound and outbound message event including delivery status, open tracking, click tracking, bounce records, and complaint data with up to thirty days retention for paid accounts and AES-256 encryption at rest

name: Mailgun Metrics and Analytics Store
description: Aggregated email sending analytics data store accessible via the Metrics API tracking deliverability rates, engagement metrics, bounce analysis, and sending reputation scores across domains and subaccounts with tag-based segmentation for campaign analysis

name: Datadog Infrastructure Monitoring Data
description: Infrastructure monitoring telemetry data collected through the Rackspace-Datadog GOLD partnership storing metrics from infrastructure performance monitoring, application performance monitoring, and log management across private cloud VM fleets with tagging strategies configured per customer account and integrated into Rackspace Fabric self-service portal

name: Cloud Identity Token and Credential Store
description: Authentication and authorization data store for the Cloud Identity Service based on OpenStack Keystone managing API authentication tokens, user credentials, role-based access control assignments, SAML federation configurations, and tenant-to-service endpoint mappings across all Rackspace Cloud API endpoints

name: ServiceNow ITSM Data Store
description: IT service management data repository within the Rackspace ServiceNow instance containing incident records, change requests, problem management data, hardware asset management records, and survey management data integrated with JIRA, Salesforce, Splunk, SAP, Slack, and the Rackspace Technology Core Ticketing System

name: RGC FedRAMP Continuous Monitoring Data Store
description: Security assessment and continuous monitoring data repository for the Rackspace Government Cloud containing FedRAMP Moderate baseline control evidence, vulnerability scan results, plan of action and milestones data, and RISC inheritable security control documentation maintained through the Xacta-powered cyber risk management platform addressing approximately eighty percent of FedRAMP security requirements

name: ObjectRocket Managed Database Store
description: Managed database-as-a-service data store operated by the ObjectRocket platform supporting hosted MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Redis, PostgreSQL, and CockroachDB instances with automated backups, performance monitoring, and self-hosted DNS resolution from the Santa Clara data center

name: Rackspace Email Mailbox Store
description: Customer email hosting data store for the Rackspace Email platform operated on emailsrvr.com infrastructure providing POP, IMAP, and webmail access with per-mailbox storage allocation and email archiving for eDiscovery compliance

name: MyRackspace Portal Session and Account Store
description: Customer portal data store for the MyRackspace registered trademark platform containing customer account profiles, service catalog configurations, portal session data, and API key management records for the unified management interface

name: RackConnect Network Configuration Store
description: Hybrid connectivity configuration data store for the RackConnect registered trademark platform containing network topology definitions, MPLS circuit parameters, Megaport and Equinix exchange peering configurations, and firewall rules linking dedicated infrastructure to cloud environments

name: Corporate Syslog Aggregation Store
description: Centralized syslog collection repository ingesting operating system logs, application logs, and infrastructure event data from across the Rackspace corporate and managed hosting environment feeding upstream to the Splunk Enterprise Security Index Cluster for correlation and analysis

name: Cloud Server Image Repository
description: Virtual machine image repository storing base operating system images from Canonical, Red Hat, SUSE, and Microsoft alongside customer-uploaded custom images for Cloud Servers provisioning across supported hypervisors including KVM on OpenStack Flex and legacy XenServer

name: Cloud DNS Zone Database
description: Authoritative DNS zone data store for the Cloud DNS API service managing domain records, zone configurations, and DNS record sets for customer domains with Anycast resolution across global points of presence

name: OpenStack Flex Metering and Billing Store
description: Usage metering and billing data for the Rackspace OpenStack Flex platform based on Genestack architecture tracking compute, storage, and network resource consumption for both utility billing and contract-based billing models presented through the manage.rackspace.com portal

name: Multicloud Build Document Repository
description: Standardized infrastructure-as-code template repository replacing legacy per-hyperscaler formats of PDF, Excel, and Visio with a unified document structure that works across AWS, Azure, and GCP build processes for managed cloud deployments

name: TACACS+ Authentication Log Store
description: Network device authentication, authorization, and accounting log data store for the TACACS+ AAA server infrastructure recording all network engineer access attempts, privilege escalation events, and command authorization records across managed network infrastructure

name: Rackspace Fabric Governance and Tagging Store
description: Multi-cloud governance policy and resource tagging metadata repository within the Rackspace Fabric platform enforcing common governance rules, resource classification tags, and compliance labeling across customer AWS, Azure, GCP, and VMware environments

name: Hosted Exchange PST Archive (Breach Forensic Evidence)
description: Personal Storage Table archives from the discontinued Rackspace Hosted Exchange environment where the Play ransomware group accessed PST files of twenty-seven out of approximately thirty thousand customers during the December 2022 security incident exploiting CVE-2022-41080 zero-day privilege escalation via Outlook Web Access

name: Customer Management Service Database
description: Customer relationship and offer management data store accessed via the Rackspace Customer Management Service API v4.24 containing customer profiles, service entitlements, account hierarchies, and offer configurations for the managed services portfolio

name: Logbook Audit Trail Store
description: Aggregated control plane audit log store combining AWS CloudTrail API request logs, Fanatical Support for AWS Control Portal login and action events, and Passport employee environment access request records providing an immutable activity trail for all managed AWS accounts

name: Cloud Load Balancer Access Log Archive
description: Hourly-processed HTTP access log files for Cloud Load Balancers stored in Cloud Files containers containing request metadata, source IP addresses via X-Forwarded-For headers, protocol details, and SSL termination connection records

name: Rackspace CDN Analytics Store
description: Content delivery network usage analytics data collected via the Rackspace Metrics API tracking per-domain request counts, bandwidth consumption, and cache hit ratios across global edge node points of presence segmented by geographic region including India, EMEA, APAC, and North America

name: Physical Access Control Log Store
description: Biometric scan authentication logs, badge access event records, and mantrap entry logs from data center physical access control systems across all Rackspace-operated facilities recording technician identity verification, access timestamps, and zone authorization records

name: Data Center Surveillance Video Archive
description: Continuous CCTV video surveillance recordings from security camera systems deployed across all Rackspace data center facilities providing twenty-four by seven by three-sixty-five visual monitoring of facility perimeters, loading docks, server floors, and equipment cages

name: Building Management System Telemetry Store
description: Environmental sensor telemetry data from the data center building management system collecting temperature, humidity, airflow, chiller performance, UPS battery status, power distribution unit loading, and generator readiness metrics across N+2 redundant cooling configurations

name: DCIM Asset and Capacity Database
description: Data center infrastructure management database tracking physical asset inventory, rack elevation diagrams, power consumption metering, cabinet-level capacity planning, IPMI connectivity records, and hardware lifecycle data across all Rackspace-operated data center locations

name: Vulnerability Scan Results Store
description: Consolidated vulnerability assessment data from the security scanning infrastructure including network vulnerability scan results, web application security test findings, compliance posture checks, and remediation tracking records supporting PCI DSS quarterly ASV scan and SOC 2 evidence requirements

name: DDoS Mitigation Event and Flow Store
description: Volumetric attack detection logs and traffic scrubbing session records from the Arbor Networks and Cisco Guard DDoS mitigation cluster including NetFlow telemetry baselines, attack signature fingerprints, mitigation activation timestamps, and post-scrub traffic analytics

name: Bomgar Remote Support Session Archive
description: Remote support session recordings, chat transcripts, and file transfer logs from the Bomgar gateway appliance documenting all remote access sessions between Rackspace support engineers and customer-managed infrastructure including session duration, commands executed, and technician identity

name: Bastion Host Session Log Store
description: SSH session logs and command audit recordings from the bastion host cluster recording all interactive and automated sessions between Rackspace engineers and managed customer infrastructure including session metadata, command history, and session replay data

name: VPN Gateway Connection Log Store
description: IPSec and SSL VPN tunnel establishment logs, authentication records, and session metadata from the VPN gateway cluster documenting all encrypted remote access connections from Rackspace employees and authorized third parties to the corporate and customer management networks

name: Site Firewall Rule and Session Log Store
description: Firewall rule configuration databases and connection session logs from site firewall clusters recording allowed and denied traffic, rule change audit trails, NAT translation records, and stateful inspection session tables across all Rackspace data center perimeters

name: RackWatch Network Monitoring Data Store
description: SNMP polling data, interface utilization graphs, and network health metrics collected by the RackWatch and MRTG network monitoring cluster tracking bandwidth consumption, interface error rates, and device availability across the Rackspace global backbone and customer-facing network infrastructure

name: Antivirus Detection and Quarantine Store
description: Malware detection event logs, signature update records, quarantine file archives, and endpoint scanning results from the eTrust antivirus server infrastructure providing centralized threat detection telemetry across managed hosting environments

name: Server Provisioning and Package Mirror Repository
description: Operating system installation templates, Kickstart configuration files, Red Hat Network satellite repository mirrors, and package distribution data used by the infrastructure provisioning system for standardized bare-metal and virtual server deployment across Rackspace data centers

name: ObjectRocket IP Address Management Database
description: IP address allocation, subnet assignment, and VLAN configuration records for the ObjectRocket platform network infrastructure managed from the Santa Clara data center tracking IPv4 and IPv6 address block utilization across the managed database-as-a-service deployment

name: Cloud Networking SDN Configuration Store
description: Software-defined networking state database for the Cloud Networking API based on OpenStack Neutron containing tenant network definitions, subnet allocations, security group rules, floating IP assignments, and GENEVE overlay tunnel configurations for both legacy OSPC and OpenStack Flex environments

name: Cloud Auto Scale Configuration Store
description: Scaling group definitions, scaling policy rules, webhook trigger configurations, and cooldown period settings for the Cloud Auto Scale service managing automatic horizontal scaling of Cloud Server groups based on schedule-based and event-based triggers

name: Rackspace Metrics Time-Series Data Store
description: Centralized time-series metrics repository providing the Rackspace Metrics API for ingestion and query of infrastructure performance data, CDN analytics, and Cloud Intelligence dashboard metrics used by Rackspace Intelligence for transparent infrastructure health visualization

name: Cloud Orchestration Stack and Template Store
description: OpenStack Heat-compatible orchestration templates and stack state records for the Cloud Orchestration service automating standardized infrastructure deployments including compute, networking, storage, and application configuration resources defined in HOT template format

name: SEC Financial Reporting Data Store
description: Consolidated financial statements, non-GAAP reconciliation schedules, segment reporting data for Public Cloud and Private Cloud business units, goodwill impairment calculations, and internal control over financial reporting evidence supporting quarterly 10-Q and annual 10-K filings with the SEC

name: Cloud Office Email Archiving Store
description: Cloud Office email archiving service storing all external, internal, incoming, and outgoing email messages including attachments in AES-256 encrypted immutable storage with eDiscovery search tools supporting compliance reporting, audit responses, and legal discovery requests with configurable retention policies and unlimited storage on Plus plan

name: Datapipe Federal Community Cloud Configuration Store
description: Configuration management database and continuous monitoring data for the legacy Datapipe Federal Community Cloud Platform that received Joint Authorization Board Provisional Authority to Operate in October 2015 serving VA, DHS, HHS, and Energy department workloads acquired by Rackspace in the 2017 Datapipe acquisition

name: TLS Certificate and Encryption Key Store
description: SSL and TLS certificate inventory, private key material, certificate signing request records, and key rotation schedules for all Rackspace-managed services including Cloud Load Balancer SSL termination certificates, Cloud Files CDN SSL endpoints, and customer-managed certificate deployments

name: Splunk Machine Learning Model Repository
description: Trained machine learning model artifacts, feature engineering pipelines, and anomaly detection model configurations within the Splunk Machine Learning Toolkit used for automated threat detection, baseline deviation alerting, and predictive analytics across the security operations telemetry

name: ObjectRocket Elasticsearch Index Store
description: Customer-provisioned Elasticsearch cluster indexes hosted on the ObjectRocket platform supporting full-text search, log analytics, and application search workloads with automated index lifecycle management, snapshot backups, and cluster health monitoring

name: Cloud Identity User Access Event Feed
description: Dedicated Cloud Feeds product feed recording all user authentication events, role assignment changes, API key rotation events, and multi-factor authentication enrollment actions from the Cloud Identity Service providing a CADF-compliant audit trail of access management activities

name: BGP Routing Table and Peering State Store
description: Border Gateway Protocol routing information base, peering session state, and route announcement records across the five autonomous system edge router clusters including AS12200, AS33070 DFW, AS27357 IAD, AS19994 ORD, and AS15395 LON maintaining the global Rackspace backbone routing topology

name: Salesforce CRM Instance
description: Customer relationship management database within the Salesforce platform containing sales pipeline data, customer account records, opportunity tracking, contract management records, and partner ecosystem data enhanced through the 2018 RelationEdge acquisition capabilities spanning Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, Marketing Cloud, and Community Cloud

name: JIRA Project and Issue Tracking Store
description: Project management and issue tracking database within the Atlassian JIRA platform containing engineering sprint backlogs, incident escalation tickets, change request workflows, and development task tracking integrated with ServiceNow, Splunk, and Salesforce through the internal tooling stack

name: Corporate Website Analytics Data Store
description: Web analytics and visitor tracking data for the rackspace.com corporate website hosted on AWS infrastructure collecting page view metrics, session recordings, marketing attribution data, A/B testing results, and conversion funnel analytics

name: Managed Security Alert and Detection Store
description: Security alert triage records, intrusion detection system event logs, and managed detection and response case data from the optional dedicated intrusion detection devices and the Rackspace PrevenTier DDoS protection system operated on behalf of managed hosting customers

name: OpenStack Flex Persistent Volume Store
description: Block and object storage volumes provisioned on the Rackspace OpenStack Flex platform based on Genestack architecture utilizing SSD and NVMe storage tiers with Ceph-backed persistent volume claims, volume snapshots, and S3-compatible and Swift-compatible object storage backends

name: SOC 2 Attestation Evidence Repository
description: Type II SOC 2 audit evidence packages containing control testing worksheets, system description documentation, risk assessment artifacts, and management assertion letters supporting annual Trust Services Criteria examinations across the Rackspace managed services, private cloud, and public cloud product lines

name: CloudHealth Cloud Cost Management Data Store
description: Multi-cloud cost analytics, savings opportunity, inventory, and governance data within the VMware CloudHealth platform integrated into the Rackspace Technology Customer Portal via single sign-on as the first CloudHealth partner providing near real-time cost data, Reserved Instance and Savings Plan utilization, tagging compliance, and departmental spend breakdowns across AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud customer accounts

name: Passport Access Management Log Store
description: Enterprise-grade identity and access management audit records from the Passport server agent system that enables Rackspace support team SSH and RDP access to customer EC2 instances and managed infrastructure while preserving native audit logs of all access requests, session durations, source systems, and technician identities

name: Rackspace Spot Marketplace and Auction Data Store
description: Kubernetes cluster configuration, node pool allocation, spot auction pricing, capacity availability, and cloudspace metadata for the Rackspace Spot platform that provides Cluster-API-based Kubernetes control planes with auto-scaling node pools, Terraform provider integration, and market price visibility across global Rackspace data centers

name: Palantir Foundry and AIP Deployment Data Store
description: Customer data ontologies, AI model configurations, pipeline definitions, and operational decision-intelligence data within Palantir Foundry and Artificial Intelligence Platform instances deployed in Rackspace Private Cloud and UK Sovereign data centers under the February 2026 strategic partnership enabling governed AI deployments for regulated industries with strict data sovereignty requirements

name: FAIR AI Use Case and Model Repository
description: Foundry for AI by Rackspace global practice repository containing over five hundred identified AI use cases across multiple industries, RAG pipeline configurations, AI agent frameworks, customer engagement artifacts, and Sema4 AI Agent Platform integration templates launched in June 2023 for accelerating enterprise AI adoption

name: Workday Human Capital Management Instance
description: Cloud-based human capital management database within the Workday platform containing employee demographic records, compensation and benefits data, payroll processing records, talent acquisition pipelines, performance management reviews, and workforce planning analytics for the Rackspace Technology global workforce as confirmed by the Rackspace employee engagement webinar hosted on the Workday platform

name: Terraform State and Infrastructure-as-Code Module Repository
description: Terraform state files stored in S3 with DynamoDB locking and server-side encryption, plus reusable infrastructure-as-code modules maintained in the rackspace-infrastructure-automation GitHub organization covering AWS, GCP, and multi-cloud provider configurations organized in layer-based directory structures following Rackspace Terraform standards with semantic versioning

name: GitLab Source Code and CI/CD Pipeline Repository
description: Source code repositories, CI/CD pipeline definitions, merge request history, and deployment artifact records within the GitLab platform used under the Rackspace-GitLab strategic alliance for cloud-native developer workflows, ServiceNow integration, and automated code promotion across customer and internal engineering environments

name: Optimizer+ Cost Optimization Recommendations Store
description: Cloud spend analysis reports, monthly account review findings, cost optimization recommendations, tagging strategy assessments, and reserved instance utilization data generated by the Optimizer+ FinOps product for AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud customer accounts providing actionable insights on workload performance and cost reduction opportunities

name: Rackspace Intelligence Dashboard Data Store
description: Infrastructure health visualization data, alarm status aggregations, and capacity trend analytics for the Rackspace Intelligence dashboard providing a transparent view of infrastructure health by consuming Rackspace Metrics time-series data and Cloud Monitoring alarm states for customer-facing operational dashboards

name: Employee Stock Purchase Plan Transaction Store
description: Enrollment agreements, payroll deduction elections, purchase period transaction records, share allocation histories, and Section 423 tax-qualified plan compliance data for the Rackspace Technology Employee Stock Purchase Plan offered to NASDAQ-listed RXT shareholders through a broker-administered platform

name: Ethics and Compliance Reporting Case Store
description: Code of Conduct violation reports, ethics hotline case records, whistleblower submissions, investigation findings, and corrective action tracking for the Rackspace Technology ethics program required by the Sarbanes-Oxley Act Section 301 anonymous reporting mandate for NASDAQ-listed companies

name: Rackspace Core Ticketing System Data Store
description: Customer support ticket records, incident histories, change request logs, SLA compliance data, and escalation chains within the Rackspace Technology Core Ticketing System accessible via the Ticketing API v2.0 REST interface that enables bidirectional ticket flow between customer ticketing platforms and internal Rackspace support queues with integration points to JIRA, Salesforce, Splunk, and ServiceNow

name: Cloud Load Balancer Access Log Archive
description: Hourly-processed HTTP and HTTPS access log files for Cloud Load Balancers stored in customer Cloud Files containers containing request metadata, X-Forwarded-For source IP headers, protocol details, response codes, and SSL termination connection records

name: Rackspace CDN Analytics Data Store
description: Content delivery network usage analytics collected via the Rackspace Metrics API tracking per-domain request counts, bandwidth consumption, and cache hit ratios across global edge node points of presence segmented by geographic region including India, EMEA, APAC, and North America

name: Cloud Networking SDN Configuration Store
description: Software-defined networking state database for the Cloud Networking API based on OpenStack Neutron containing tenant network definitions, subnet allocations, security group rules, floating IP assignments, and GENEVE overlay tunnel configurations with OVN for both legacy and OpenStack Flex environments

name: Xacta FedRAMP Continuous Monitoring Data Store
description: Telos Xacta risk management platform data powering the Rackspace Inheritable Security Controls program addressing eighty percent of FedRAMP security controls and enabling thirteen-plus FedRAMP Authorities to Operate with OSCAL-formatted security plan documentation and continuous monitoring evidence packages

name: SmartTickets Automated Alert Resolution Store
description: Automated alert triage and resolution records from the Rackspace SmartTickets system which processed more than five thousand seven hundred Azure monitoring alerts in January 2025 alone, containing alert classification, auto-resolution actions taken, escalation decisions, and resolution timestamps

name: Rackspace Logbook Aggregated Audit Trail Store
description: Aggregated control plane audit log store combining AWS CloudTrail API write-event logs, Fanatical Support for AWS Control Portal login and action events, and Passport employee environment access request records with source IP, duration, and resource details for all managed AWS accounts

name: Cloud DNS Zone and Record Store
description: Customer-hosted DNS zone files containing A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, NS, TXT, SPF, DKIM, and SRV records served via globally distributed Anycast network through dns1.stabletransit.com, dns2.stabletransit.com, ns.rackspace.com, and ns2.rackspace.com from servers in Texas, Virginia, Chicago, and London with default TTL of 3600 seconds and bind9-format export capability via Cloud DNS API 1.0

name: Rackspace Email Hosted Mailbox Store
description: Customer-hosted email mailbox data including inbox, sent, trash, and custom folder contents with twenty-five gigabyte per-mailbox storage limit across the Rackspace Email platform managed via Cloud Office Control Panel supporting Outlook integration, webmail access at apps.rackspace.com, PST and MBOX import and export, spam filtering, and per-domain archiving capability at ten dollars per mailbox per month with optional Plus archiving package

name: Rackspace Monitoring Check, Alarm, and Metric Store
description: Infrastructure monitoring data including check configurations, alarm states, agent heartbeat metrics, remote availability checks from global monitoring zones, agent-based CPU and filesystem and memory and network metrics, notification plan records, and custom plugin output for the Rackspace Monitoring API-driven service with lightweight agents consuming approximately five megabytes of memory installed on customer cloud servers and database instances

name: Customer Management Service Account Database
description: Backend data store for the Rackspace Customer Management Service API version 4.24.0 containing customer account records, contact profiles, account registration codes, primary contact designations, support PIN credentials, API key assignments, and role-based access control configurations for public and private cloud portal users

name: Offer Service Product Catalog and Pricing Store
description: Product catalog and pricing data managed through the Rackspace Offer API version 2.0 containing service offer definitions, multi-currency pricing configurations, product tier structures, and service level agreement terms for all Rackspace cloud and managed services offerings

name: Cloud Office Email and Apps Administration Store
description: Administrative data store for the Rackspace Email and Apps REST API at api.emailsrvr.com managing customer accounts, domain configurations, mailbox provisioning with size allocations, Exchange mailbox settings, reseller hierarchies, and distribution group memberships for all Cloud Office hosted email customers

name: ServiceNow ITSM Incident and Change Management Store
description: ServiceNow IT service management platform data at rackspace.service-now.com containing system status records, incident management tickets, change request workflows, hardware asset management records, and service catalog entries integrated with JIRA, Salesforce, Splunk, SAP, Slack, and the Rackspace Technology Core Ticketing System

name: Undercloud Bare Metal Provisioning Database
description: Internal bare metal as a service provisioning database based on OpenStack Ironic powering the Rackspace Undercloud product containing server enrollment records with IPMI and Redfish BMC credentials, MAC addresses, hardware specifications, RAID configurations, PXE boot settings, node provisioning state history, and deployment event logs for all physical servers across Rackspace data centers

name: Cloud Control Panel Session and Preference Store
description: Web application session data and user preference records for the Rackspace Cloud Control Panel at mycloud.rackspace.com including authenticated session tokens, service catalog endpoint caches, server tag configurations, multi-region view preferences, RBAC role assignments for cloud service access, and per-user dashboard layouts for Cloud Servers, Cloud Files, Cloud Networks, and Cloud Block Storage management

name: Salesforce CRM Customer and Pipeline Data Store
description: Salesforce customer relationship management platform data containing sales opportunity pipeline records, customer account profiles, lead and contact management records, customer engagement history, marketing campaign data, and sales forecasting models leveraged by a Salesforce Platinum Partner organization with over five hundred Salesforce certifications and RelationEdge acquisition expertise

name: Cloud Office Control Panel Administration Store
description: Cloud Office Control Panel administrative data managing hosted email domain configurations, mailbox provisioning queues, spam filter settings, email archiving policy assignments, webmail session state, and administrator action audit logs for Rackspace Email and Microsoft Exchange hosted services

name: Security Vulnerability Disclosure and Bug Bounty Store
description: Responsible disclosure program data containing submitted security vulnerability reports, triage and validation records, remediation tracking, researcher acknowledgments, and coordinated disclosure timeline documentation for the Rackspace Technology security vulnerability reporting program

name: General Ledger and Financial Reporting Data Store
description: Enterprise financial management system containing general ledger journal entries, accounts receivable with credit loss allowances, accounts payable, revenue recognition records based on daily service delivery, segment reporting for Public Cloud and Private Cloud business units, non-GAAP to GAAP reconciliation workpapers, goodwill and intangible asset impairment testing, and consolidated financial statements filed with the SEC as Form 10-K and 10-Q

name: Law Enforcement Request and Disclosure Report Store
description: Annual law enforcement request disclosure records tracking the number and type of legal demands for customer data received from law enforcement agencies worldwide including subpoena counts for non-content data and warrant counts for content data with compliance verification against applicable legal standards published in the Rackspace Technology Law Enforcement Request Disclosure Report

name: Authorized Sub-Processor Registry and DPA Store
description: Registry of Rackspace Authorized Sub-Processors with associated data processing agreements, Standard Contractual Clauses, UK International Data Transfer Addendums, processing purpose descriptions, geographic processing locations, and annual update records as required by the Rackspace Technology Global Data Processing Addendum and APEC Cross Border Privacy Rules certification

name: Board and Corporate Governance Document Repository
description: Corporate governance records including board of directors meeting minutes, committee charters for audit and compensation committees, non-employee director compensation policy documentation, restricted stock unit grant records, proxy statement drafts, corporate bylaws, and Section 16 insider trading compliance filings for the Rackspace Technology Inc NASDAQ-listed entity

name: BGP Routing Table and Peering Configuration Store
description: Border Gateway Protocol routing information base, prefix announcements, and peering session configurations across the AS-RACKSPACE autonomous system set comprising fourteen-plus ASNs including AS33070 DFW, AS27357 IAD, AS19994 ORD, AS15395 LON, AS10532 primary, and AS12200 PeeringDB-registered peering ASN along with legacy acquisition ASNs for Datapipe, Layered Tech, GoGrid, Fastservers, and Adapt with RADB IRR registration maintained by noc@rackspace.com

name: Cloud Office DNS Zone and Domain Registration Store
description: DNS zone records and domain registration data for the Cloud Office email hosting platform served through five nameservers at DNS1 through DNS5.NAME-SERVICES.COM containing MX records for email routing, SPF and DKIM authentication records, customer domain registrations with annual renewal tracking, and CNAME aliases for webmail access separate from the Cloud DNS stabletransit.com infrastructure

name: RackConnect Global Virtual Circuit Configuration Store
description: Software-defined multi-cloud interconnection platform configuration data containing virtual circuit definitions, bandwidth allocations from fifty megabits to ten gigabits per second, cross-connect provisioning records across Megaport and Equinix Cloud Exchange Fabric ecosystems, AWS Direct Connect and Azure ExpressRoute peering sessions, customer backbone routing policies, and 99.9 percent uptime SLA monitoring records for all RackConnect Global enabled Rackspace data centers and edge locations

name: Infrastructure Automation Toolbox Terraform State Store
description: Terraform state files and infrastructure-as-code execution records for the Rackspace Infrastructure Automation Toolbox Docker container published at gcr.io/rs-public-containers/rackspace-toolbox containing customer environment layer definitions, AWS and GCP Terraform module configurations for VPC, ECS, EKS, Aurora, IAM, security groups, and auto-scaling groups, CloudWatch alarm policies that generate Rackspace support tickets, and Janus Playground test account execution logs

name: ObjectRocket Platform Metadata and Container Image Store
description: ObjectRocket managed database platform operational data including container image registry for MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Redis, and MySQL database instances, self-hosted DNS zone records for customer database connect strings, backup metadata repository tracking daily mongodump compressed archives, instance provisioning records, PCIe flash storage allocation maps, and customer SSO session tokens at app.objectrocket.com integrated with Rackspace Cloud and Dedicated portal authentication

name: Recursive DNS Query Log and Cache Store
description: DNS query resolution logs and response cache data from the Rackspace internal caching DNS resolver fleet and Datapipe legacy DNS infrastructure serving recursive DNS lookups for all customer-hosted cloud workloads and dedicated servers including query source IP addresses, queried domain names, response codes, resolution latency metrics, and DNSSEC validation results

name: HIPAA Business Associate Agreement and PHI Processing Registry
description: HIPAA Business Associate Agreement compliance records and protected health information processing documentation for healthcare customers including signed BAA contracts, HITRUST CSF certification evidence across more than three hundred in-scope controls in nineteen domains, ePHI handling procedures for dedicated hosting and managed AWS and Azure environments, breach notification protocols, and customer PHI scope mappings

name: DFARS CUI Compliance and CDI Assessment Data Store
description: Defense Federal Acquisition Regulation Supplement compliance records containing NIST SP 800-171 Controlled Unclassified Information security requirement assessments, Covered Defense Information scope definitions, CDI assessment findings reported to DoD CIO, FedRAMP System Security Plan mappings across all fourteen NIST 800-171 control families, and ITAR-controlled technical data handling procedures for customers with Department of Defense contracts hosted on the Joint Authorization Board-accredited Rackspace FedRAMP Private Cloud

name: ESG Sustainability and Carbon Emissions Data Repository
description: Environmental, Social and Governance sustainability data including Science Based Targets initiative validated greenhouse gas reduction targets of fifty percent by 2032 and ninety percent by 2045, third-party audited Scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions baselines, data center energy consumption metrics with DFW facility reducing power by approximately 1,700 MWh between 2023 and 2024, Power Purchase Agreement and Renewable Energy Certificate tracking covering 28.4 percent of data center electricity, UK Carbon Reduction Plan disclosures, circular IT asset disposal records, and annual sustainability report data published since 2023

name: IRAP Assessment and CCSL Certification Evidence Store
description: Information Security Registered Assessors Program assessment records for the Rackspace Dedicated Hosting Environment in Australia containing ACSC certification evidence for Unclassified DLM data handling across three data halls in Sydney with Data Hall 140 meeting required physical security, ISM and PSPF control compliance documentation, residual risk assessments, and Australian Government entity authorization records for IaaS and PaaS services

name: Corporate Restructuring and Transformation Program Data
description: Corporate restructuring and digital transformation program records documenting the 2016 Apollo Global Management take-private acquisition at 4.3 billion dollars, 2020 initial public offering on NASDAQ at 8 billion dollar valuation, headquarters relocation from 800,000 square feet to 80,000 square feet facility in San Antonio, workforce right-sizing programs, managed service portfolio pivots from infrastructure hosting to multi-cloud managed services, and ongoing strategic transformation initiatives under successive CEO leadership transitions

name: Managed Data Warehouse and Analytics Pipeline Metadata Store
description: Managed services metadata for customer data warehouse and data lake deployments including Snowflake Premier Partner implementation records, managed analytics pipeline configurations for ETL and ELT orchestration, BI tool integration mappings for PowerBI, Tableau, Looker, Qlik, and QuickSights, DataOps lifecycle management configurations, and customer use case definitions for AI, machine learning, demand forecasting, and anomaly detection workloads

name: Rackspace Cyber Recovery Cloud Backup and IRE Configuration Store
description: Rackspace Cyber Recovery Cloud powered by Rubrik data containing immutable backup replicas in air-gapped isolated recovery environments, zero-trust architecture configurations, anomaly detection and threat monitoring records, recovery-as-code Infrastructure as Code templates, disaster recovery drill results and readiness assessment findings, RTO and RPO planning documents, and automated recovery playbook definitions for ransomware incident response across public cloud, private cloud, and hybrid environments

name: Technology Market Research and Industry Survey Data Repository
description: Market research and industry survey data from Rackspace Technology-commissioned studies including annual IT investment priority surveys conducted in association with VMware, cloud adoption benchmark reports, AI readiness assessments, customer satisfaction surveys, and technology trend analyses used to inform product strategy, content marketing, and investor communications

name: Anti-Bribery and Trade Sanctions Compliance Records
description: Anti-bribery and sanctions compliance records for a NASDAQ-listed multinational operating across United States, United Kingdom, Germany, Australia, India, and Singapore including Foreign Corrupt Practices Act compliance documentation, UK Bribery Act obligations for London operations, OFAC sanctions screening results for global customer onboarding, export control classifications, and third-party due diligence records for supplier and partner compliance verification

name: Churn Risk Prediction Model Data Store
description: Synthesized data from multiple sources including account movement and opportunity data used to power customer churn risk prediction model. Enables customer success teams to predict retention risks and identify cross-sell opportunities. Part of internal data modernization that consolidated 70 data warehouses and reduced 400 dashboards to 20. Includes sAFE methodology implementation. Source: rackspace.com/case-studies/rackspace-technology-0 internal data modernization case study.

name: Consolidated Enterprise Data Warehouse
description: Consolidated data warehouse resulting from internal data modernization effort that reduced 70 data warehouses to a unified platform. Supports 20 standardized dashboards (reduced from 400). Maintains PCI and GDPR compliance controls and internal retention policies. Features ISO-like data quality certification stamp with standardized data definitions and governance. Improved data velocity from 91 days to 17 days through sAFE implementation. Source: rackspace.com/case-studies/rackspace-technology-0.

name: Customer Success Analytics Dashboard Data
description: Dashboard dataset powering 20 standardized customer success dashboards (consolidated from 400). Includes customer characteristics, account health metrics, cross-sell opportunity signals, and retention risk scores. Supports sales motion with actionable recommendations. Governed by standardized data definitions with ISO-like quality certification. Source: rackspace.com/case-studies/rackspace-technology-0.
